property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Until your next turn, up to two target creatures each have base power and toughness 0/3 and lose all abilities. −2: Target player draws two cards. Until your next turn, instant, sorcery, and planeswalker spells that player casts cost {2} less to cast. −8: Target player gets an emblem with "Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy." Partner with Rowan Kenrith Will Kenrith can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: During target player's next turn, each creature that player controls attacks if able. −2: Rowan Kenrith deals 3 damage to each tapped creature target player controls. −8: Target player gets an emblem with "Whenever you activate an ability that isn't a mana ability, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy." Partner with Will Kenrith Rowan Kenrith can be your commander.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Krav, the Unredeemed (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Krav into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Flying At the beginning of each end step, if your team gained life this turn, create two 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Regna, the Redeemer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Regna into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {B}, Sacrifice X creatures: Target player draws X cards and gains X life. Put X +1/+1 counters on Krav, the Unredeemed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Okaun, Eye of Chaos (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Okaun into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin until you lose a flip. Whenever a player wins a coin flip, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Zndrsplt, Eye of Wisdom (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Zndrsplt into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) At the beginning of combat on your turn, flip a coin until you lose a flip. Whenever a player wins a coin flip, double Okaun's power and toughness until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Gorm the Great (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Gorm into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Deathtouch Whenever Virtus the Veiled deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Virtus the Veiled (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Virtus into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Vigilance Gorm the Great must be blocked if able, and Gorm must be blocked by two or more creatures if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Sylvia Brightspear (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Sylvia into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Flying, haste Knights your team controls have flying and haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Khorvath Brightflame (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Khorvath into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Double strike Dragons your team controls have double strike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Toothy, Imaginary Friend (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Toothy into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) If one or more counters would be put on a permanent your team controls, that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters are put on that permanent instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Pir, Imaginative Rascal (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Pir into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Toothy, Imaginary Friend. When Toothy leaves the battlefield, draw a card for each +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Blaring Captain (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Blaring Captain into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {2}{W}: Create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Blaring Recruiter (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Blaring Recruiter into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Whenever Blaring Captain attacks, attacking Warriors get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Chakram Slinger (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Chakram Slinger into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Whenever you cast a spell during your turn, untap target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Chakram Retriever (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Chakram Retriever into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {R}, {T}: Chakram Slinger deals 2 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Soulblade Renewer (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Soulblade Renewer into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Deathtouch Whenever a creature with a +1/+1 counter on it attacks one of your opponents, that creature gains deathtouch until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Soulblade Corrupter (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Soulblade Corrupter into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) When Soulblade Renewer enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Proud Mentor (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Proud Mentor into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) Whenever Impetuous Protege attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among tapped creatures your opponents control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Impetuous Protege (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Impetuous Protege into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Lore Weaver (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Lore Weaver into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {T}: Untap two target lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Partner with Ley Weaver (When this creature enters the battlefield, target player may put Ley Weaver into their hand from their library, then shuffle.) {5}{U}{U}: Target player draws two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Arena Rector dies, you may exile it. If you do, search your library for a planeswalker card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I see something special in you - a bright ember that yearns to dance among the stars."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Aurora Champion attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many combatants at Valor's Reach wield glowing weapons to distract their enemies and delight the crowd.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Brightling gains vigilance until end of turn. {W}: Brightling gains lifelink until end of turn. {W}: Return Brightling to its owner's hand. {1}: Brightling gets +1/-1 or -1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.) Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Big, wicked, and not too smart. Poor thing never stood a chance against us, dear." - Regna, to Krav

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.) When Dwarven Lightsmith enters the battlefield, creatures your team controls get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {3}{W}. If you do, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The competition is but one aspect of the spectacle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.) Exile all nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most sensational plays send everyone home breathless.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend puts a +1/+1 counter on each creature they control. Each foe chooses one untapped creature they control, then taps the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show them the light, my love." - Krav, the Unredeemed

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {4} of this spell's cost.) Flying When Skystreamer enters the battlefield, target player gains 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Victories at Valor's Reach are broadcast via griffins in the sky above.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Together Forever enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) {1}: Choose target creature with a counter on it. When that creature dies this turn, return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{U}, {T}: Target player draws a card, then exiles a card from their hand. If a creature card is exiled this way, that player creates a token that's a copy of that card. When Arcane Artisan leaves the battlefield, exile all tokens created with it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Gain control of all Auras and Equipment that were attached to it, then attach them to another creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A moment of distraction, a lifetime of regret.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.) Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Game Plan.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Plan for victory, or prepare for defeat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {2} of this spell's cost.) Two target players each draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Are you sure this is going to work?" asked Will. "No," said Rowan. "But if it does, it's going to be spectacular."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Nimbus Champion attacks, you may return target creature to its owner's hand if that creature's power is less than or equal to the number of Warriors your team controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.) Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The wardens watch for illegal tactics and protect spectators from the occasional rogue fireball.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Saltwater Stalwart deals damage to an opponent, target player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every attack is a test of your defenses. Every hit marks the map of your defeat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Soaring Show-Off enters the battlefield, each player draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some spectators love an underdog, but others are just as happy to support a proven winner.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Spellseeker enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 2 or less, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mages and warriors recruited from across Kylem display their skills at Valor's Reach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.) When Spellweaver Duo enters the battlefield, you may return target tapped creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Synchronized spellweaving is a difficult but rewarding skill to master.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend creates a token that's a copy of a creature they control. Each foe returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zndrsplt retired from officiating when she teamed up with Okaun, but she still knows the penalties better than anyone else.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Your opponents can't gain life. At the beginning of each end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life that player lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {5} of this spell's cost.) When Bloodborn Scoundrels enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The ring plays host to some combatants that the spectators love to hate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {3} of this spell's cost.) {2}: Fan Favorite gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pathetic! I've heard more noise in a monastery. Let me hear you, Valor's Reach!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.) Destroy target creature with power X or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Well, who do we have here, Gorm?" "No one, Virtus. No one at all."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2, has flying, and is a Demon in addition to its other types. When Inner Demon enters the battlefield, all non-Demon creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever your opponents are dealt combat damage, if any of that damage was dealt by a Warrior, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There will be no secrets between us . . . like it or not."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Sickle Dancer attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, Sickle Dancer gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next time you would lose the game this turn, instead draw seven cards and your life total becomes 1. Exile Stunning Reversal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The line between victory and defeat can be as slim as a razor's edge.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Thrasher Brute or another Warrior enters the battlefield under your team's control, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some competitors fight for glory or money. Some just like hitting people.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put onto the battlefield under your control all creature cards in all graveyards that were put there from the battlefield this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend returns a creature card from their graveyard to their hand. Each foe sacrifices a creature they control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Brutality had never been so exquisite.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Azra Bladeseeker enters the battlefield, each player on your team may discard a card, then each player who discarded a card this way draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Never get too attached to a weapon. You must allow a better one to find its way to you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, that player copies it and may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When the twin-spell bonus round begins, the crowd rises to its feet in anticipation of incredible combinations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Bull-Rush Bruiser attacks, if your team controls another Warrior, Bull-Rush Bruiser gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There will always be a spot at Valor's Reach for headlong violence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Cheering Fanatic attacks, choose a card name. Spells with the chosen name cost {1} less to cast this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Punch 'em, kick 'em, bite 'em, beat 'em! Burn 'em all and we'll defeat 'em!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend discards all cards from their hand, then draws that many cards plus one. Khorvath's Fury deals damage to each foe equal to the number of cards in their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {7} of this spell's cost.) Flying When Lava-Field Overlord enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.) Trample, haste

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stadium is well-stocked with hazards to force the action if combatants show too much caution.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Warrior attacks, you may have its controller create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Untap all attacking creatures. They gain trample, lifelink, and haste until end of turn. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Activate only during combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Stadium Vendors enters the battlefield, choose a player. That player adds two mana of any one color they choose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Potions! Mana potions, health potions, energy potions - get your potions here!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of each opponent's library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among those exiled cards, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, that creature's controller creates a token that's a copy of that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Within this grove, you belong to me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {7} of this spell's cost.) Trample

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arena beasts are bred for flashiness and foul temper. An extra head addresses both requirements.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Two target creatures your team controls each deal damage equal to their power to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Success at Valor's Reach requires not only individual skill but also the ability to merge that skill with a partner's.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {X} of this spell's cost. You choose the value of X.) Support X. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures.) Each creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another Warrior enters the battlefield under your team's control, put a +1/+1 counter on Decorated Champion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The oddsmakers hate him because every fight is a foregone conclusion. The crowd loves him for exactly the same reason.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Generous Patron enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.) Whenever you put one or more counters on a creature you don't control, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other creatures have "Whenever this creature attacks, you may have it fight Grothama, All-Devouring." When Grothama leaves the battlefield, each player draws cards equal to the amount of damage dealt to Grothama this turn by sources they controlled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Jungle Wayfinder enters the battlefield, each player may search their library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into their hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She is adept at navigating the stadium's ever-changing landscape.

property.name: Rules
property.value: For each player, choose friend or foe. Each friend searches their library for a land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles. Each foe sacrifices an artifact or enchantment they control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, trample As Archon of Valor's Reach enters the battlefield, choose artifact, enchantment, instant, sorcery, or planeswalker. Players can't cast spells of the chosen type.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may discard a card. If you do, choose a creature. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player this turn, you draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I never give odds on my own fights. Unless, of course, you want to bet against me . . ."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a creature at random, then destroy the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some train all their lives for a shot at the title. Some just get really, really lucky.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Warriors your team controls have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I like a quick victory. More time to celebrate."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Assist (Another player can pay up to {6} of this spell's cost.) Flying When Vampire Charmseeker enters the battlefield, return target instant, sorcery, or creature card from a graveyard to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an instant or sorcery spell is cast during your turn, Sentinel Tower deals damage to any target equal to 1 plus the number of instant and sorcery spells cast before that spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The built-in obstacles force competitors to think three moves ahead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap Victory Chimes during each other player's untap step. {T}: A player of your choice adds {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The favored noisemaker of goblins ever since the wardens cracked down on explosives.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bountiful Promenade enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {G} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: No pilgrimage to Valor's Reach is complete without a stroll through its celebrated shopping district.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Luxury Suite enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The view is rivaled only by the decadence of the decor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morphic Pool enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ancient magic reshapes the stage into a variety of landscapes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sea of Clouds enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Skybridges from across Kylem converge at the grand stadium of Valor's Reach.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spire Garden enters the battlefield tapped unless you have two or more opponents. {T}: Add {R} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: From thrilling combat to unparalleled vistas, Valor's Reach has it all.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Bitter vengeance never glowed so bright nor sang so sweet.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The harmony of the glorious is a dirge to the wicked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Angelic Gift enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has flying.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is elegance in all the Ojutai do - even their killing." - Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The blood of Dromoka and the blood of my veins are the same."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Expedition Raptor enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kor Spiritdancer gets +2/+2 for each Aura attached to it. Whenever you cast an Aura spell, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: She reaches beyond the physical realm, touching the ideals from which all creatures draw their power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for up to three basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightwalker has flying as long as it has a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The greatest gift Dromoka gives is the ability to fly without wings." - Urdnan, Dromoka warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. At the beginning of the next end step, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The person who finishes a journey is rarely the same as the one who starts it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Loyal Pegasus can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even if I should die in the saddle, she will not let me fall to the ground." - Hypatia of the Winged Horse

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Exile Mangara of Corondor and target permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have been brought to this place and I cannot leave. I may be free of the amber, but I am still in prison."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Midnight Guard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you're on watch, no noise is harmless and no shadow can be ignored." - Olgard of the Skiltfolk

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Oreskos Explorer enters the battlefield, search your library for up to X Plains cards, where X is the number of players who control more lands than you. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: For the first time in his life, Grakk felt a little warm and fuzzy inside.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A raptor will follow any order as long as that order is "hunt," "kill," or "go for the guts."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No one chooses to be stitched together into a skaab. If it could speak, it would beg for its own destruction." - Thalia, Knight-Cathar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Royal Trooper blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Loyalty guides me. Pride compels me. Anger sustains me. And the pay isn't bad."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sea Gate may have fallen, but we still stand. We still fight." - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{W}, Sacrifice Silverchase Fox: Exile target enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Be careful in your hunt. The clever little creature can steal your wards and lead you right into the werewolf's den." - Britta, midwife of Gatstaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will be reimbursed for your donation." "The reimbursement is spiritual." - Temple signs

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sparring Mummy enters the battlefield, untap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aspiring to earn their place in the afterlife, acolytes train every day against those who fell short of that glory.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance {1}{W}: Target creature with a +1/+1 counter on it gains flying and vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It glides over the landscape. It also happens to be one.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The smallest seed of regret can bloom into redemption.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create three 1/1 white Warrior creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Many scales make the skin of a dragon." - Abzan wisdom

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+2 until end of turn. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In times of infestation and war, Zendikar favors the blades that strike in unison.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Some fates you can see coming for you, plain as day, and there's nothing you can do about them." - Callaphe the mariner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Its controller draws a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: On Bant, a sigil is both a prize of honor and a bond of duty. The one who bears it may be called to fulfill that charge at any moment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Claustrophobia enters the battlefield, tap enchanted creature. Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Six feet of earth muffled his cries.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "She knows every step of this coastline, both above and below the surface, and she has hideouts all along the way. She will get you there." - Jori En, expedition leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender, flying Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to and dealt by Fog Bank.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The union of sea and sky makes a perfect cover." - Talrand, sky summoner

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You call it luck. I call it preparation."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Kitesail Corsair has flying as long as it's attacking.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why perch in the crow's nest when I can fly like the crows?"

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It is fascinating to see how the people of this plane replicate magical techniques without a natural gift. Also frustrating." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The people of the Sevick Isles have a unique understanding of the term "ominous clouds."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Omenspeaker enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Her prophecies amaze her even as she speaks them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Scry 1, then draw a card." (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Peregrine Drake enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Always a welcome sight breaking through the clouds." - Talrand, sky summoner

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The construction of a defense is not accomplished by adding bricks." - Jace Beleren

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Sower of Temptation enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature for as long as Sower of Temptation remains on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One glamer leads him far from home. The next washes away his memory that home was ever anywhere but at her side.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell with mana value 2.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With practice, the measurement of magic can lead to its mastery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exchange control of two target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Say hello to your new friend.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, return target permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The stadium tests more than just fighting skill. For example, swimming ability.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As True-Name Nemesis enters the battlefield, choose a player. True-Name Nemesis has protection from the chosen player.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Watercourser gets +1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Beware an eddy where there should be none or a stretch that flows too fast or too slow." - Old Fishbones, Martyne river guide

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. Its controller discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Selesnya missionaries moved into the Shanav Quarter, they faced scorn, ridicule, and ultimately martyrdom.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is how wars are won - not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed." - Yurin, royal assassin

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One of the many reasons why open-air markets close at dusk.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Doomed Dissenter dies, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is only one fate left to those banished from the God-Pharaoh's city.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eyeblight Assassin enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Boggart blood disgusts me almost as much as the foul creatures themselves."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player discards two cards. Scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+1 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Silumgar trains those whom he favors in his magic, granting them the ability to spread his disdain across the land.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Takedowns in Valor's Reach are never meant to be lethal, but that doesn't mean they won't be incredibly painful.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You harbor such vast potential. It would be such a shame to let you die of old age." - Zul Ashur, lich lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Draw cards equal to the mana value of the sacrificed permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every creation carries a piece of its creators. Their knowledge, their dreams, their soul. That is the best part."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you tap a Swamp for mana, add an additional {B}. {B}: Nirkana Revenant gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Hate is an everlasting wellspring from which it is eternally sustained.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Noosegraf Mob enters the battlefield with five +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever a player casts a spell, remove a +1/+1 counter from Noosegraf Mob. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Noxious Dragon dies, you may destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons of Silumgar's brood begin to digest their prey even before consuming it, letting their caustic breath do much of the work.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As Nyxathid enters the battlefield, choose an opponent. Nyxathid gets -1/-1 for each card in the chosen player's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Born of volcanic forces, it thrives on the absolute panic it inspires.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You wish to remember this lesson? I will write it down for you." - Senifet, vizier of Bontu

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's rare that the Prakhata Club closes its doors. It's also rare that Lord Gonti meets with Consul Kambal. What are the odds the two would occur on the same day?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on Quest for the Gravelord. Remove three quest counters from Quest for the Gravelord and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Rotfeaster Maggot enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain life equal to that card's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Is it at the top of the food chain or the bottom?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Screeching Buzzard dies, each opponent discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A shrill creature that delights in the misery of others - what's not to love?" - Braids, dementia summoner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shambling Ghoul enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once he gets up and going, he will forever shamble on.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Slum Reaper enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's sent into unguilded districts by the Orzhov to collect the souls of those no one will miss.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Swarm of Bloodflies enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Swarm of Bloodflies.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Gudul delta, bloodfly bites are indistinguishable from spear wounds.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Pay 3 life: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, you gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Rakdos cultists are her best customers. They never flinch at pain and are seldom good at math.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Tenacious Dead dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Raising the bones of Hekjek the Mad proved far easier than getting them to lie back down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bathe in Dragonfire deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The scent of cooked flesh lingers in the charred landscape of Tarkir.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender {T}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I will build no sanctuaries. The safety you seek can be won only by the sword." - Yannash, outpost builder

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blaze deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature fights another target creature. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Succession is a matter of blood, and by blood it is often decided.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cowards can't block Warriors. {R}: Target creature becomes a Coward until end of turn. {2}{R}: Target creature becomes a Warrior until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has haste. {R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. When a creature with mana value 6 or greater enters the battlefield, you may return Dragon Breath from your graveyard to the battlefield attached to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Dragon Hatchling gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Those dragons grow fast. For a while they feed on squirrels and goblins and then suddenly you're missing a mammoth." - Hurdek, Mazar mammoth trainer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Earth elementals have the eternal strength of stone and the endurance of mountains. Primordially connected to the land they inhabit, they take a long-term view of things, scorning the impetuous haste of short-lived mortal creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The only livestock that will survive for long in the Smelting District, ember beasts serve many functions - none of them willingly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Enthralling Victor enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you stare at the sun for too long, you'll lose your ability to see clearly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gains haste until end of turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {7}{R}: Flamewave Invoker deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inside even the humblest goblin lurks the potential for far greater things - and far worse.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}, Sacrifice a land: Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin Razerunners. At the beginning of your end step, you may have Goblin Razerunners deal damage equal to the number of +1/+1 counters on it to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Finding an unexplored world, they immediately set it on fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The victim was either clawed to death or struck by lightning. Possibly both." - Pel Javya, Wojek investigator

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each upkeep, Magmatic Force deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's the pinnacle of utter destructiveness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The expected way through the trial is far too tedious."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, Sacrifice Reckless Reveler: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The gods of Theros are born of the expectations and beliefs of mortals. If I have found godhood, what does that say about their true desires?" - Xenagos, god of revels

property.name: Rules
property.value: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The tools of invention became the weapons of revolution.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Do you hear that, Sarkhan? The glory of the horde! I made a legend from what you abandoned." - Zurgo, khan of the Mardu

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, tap all lands that player controls. If a creature an opponent controls attacks, all creatures that opponent controls attack if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Razia, archangel of war, demands total commitment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our pyromancer's flames may not have killed them, but they bought us the time we needed." - The War Diaries

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature. It gets +2/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. (It can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A slayer gets by on wits and reflexes." - Higa, slayer-captain of Gatstaf

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Monsters dwell in every heart. We only think civilization tames them." ―Euphemia, Nexus watcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It keeps the upper reaches of the forest free of every menace . . . except for the spider itself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knights of Troinir Keep took the rhino as their emblem due to its intense focus when charging down a perceived threat - a trait they discovered on a hunting excursion.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Consulate guards who pursue fleeing renegades into the Cowl often become lost - occasionally permanently - in the city's wildest greenbelt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Petrifying gaze, deadly fangs, knifelike dorsal spines, venomous saliva . . . Am I missing anything? . . . Toxic bones? Seriously?" - Samila, Murasa Expeditionary House

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Elvish Visionary enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From a tiny sprout, the greatest trees grow and flourish. May the seeds of your mind be equally fruitful."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Feral Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {3}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Feral Hydra. Any player may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shreds its prey as each head fights for the choicest bits.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The true strength of nature is not the raging storm or the charging rhino, but the inexorable vitality of life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The prohibition of unnecessary tossing of the citizenry by giants shall also extend to spontaneous giants." - Isperia's Edict, provision VII.789.2

property.name: Rules
property.value: Sacrifice a creature: Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power, then discard three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's wisdom to be gained in death - whether it be one's own or someone else's." - Jarad, Golgari Lich-Lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Hunted Wumpus enters the battlefield, each other player may put a creature card from their hand onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Karametra's Favor enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The harvest god's cornucopia contains the fruits of the fields, the forest, and beyond.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {5}{G}: Kraul Warrior gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The insectile kraul lurk in the tunnels below street level. Many are loyal to the Golgari Swarm, but others follow their own esoteric caste system.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Gideon and Nissa carved a path through the Eldrazi swarm, and their Zendikari allies charged into the fray behind them.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What would Urza think, I wonder, if he could hear how the nature mages still snarl at his name, but venerate the work of his apprentice?" - Teferi, to Jhoira

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It might fight the Eldrazi, but don't mistake it for a companion, Gideon. It's not interested in your concept of strength through unity." - Najiya, leader of the Tajuru

property.name: Rules
property.value: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To the unskilled, it appears as blurred patches of distorted light. Few have seen its true form." - Garruk Wildspeaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Little flower twirl and bloom, arise from this, your rocky tomb. Little warrior slash and brawl, be born again to free us all."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dragons are feared for their breath and their bite, but it is their wings that make them unconquerable. Bring them to earth, and they die like any other beast." - Kassur, Sultai hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Saddleback Lagac enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A good lagac will carry you through thick and thin. A bad one . . . well, it's a tasty dinner." - Raff Slugeater, goblin shortcutter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her voice is the wilderness, savage and pure." - Kamahl, druid acolyte

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The forest's constant struggle is to keep the spreading flowstone at bay.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Veteran Explorer dies, each player may search their library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample If damage would be dealt to another creature you control, prevent that damage. Put a +1/+1 counter on that creature for each 1 damage prevented this way. When Vigor is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with power less than Wandering Wolf's power can't block it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Humans still feared wolves, though no connection between them and the curse of lycanthropy had ever been proved.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Apocalypse Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. If X is 5 or more, it enters the battlefield with an additional X +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{R}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Apocalypse Hydra: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!" - Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Centaur Healer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dinrova Horror enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits." - Sign outside Dinrova Building

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on another creature you control, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Enduring Scalelord.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Only the sun that beats down upon Arashin's walls could shine more brightly.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may have Evil Twin enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it has "{U}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with the same name as this creature."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}{U}, {T}: Put a bribery counter on target creature you don't control. Its controller draws a card. Creatures with bribery counters on them can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance Whenever Jelenn Sphinx attacks, other attacking creatures get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Few among the Azorius have ever spoken with the sphinxes, but all have felt their influence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 7 life and draws two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a year, Akrasa holds a joust that draws knights and their leotaus from every nation on Bant. The prize is an Akrasan sigil, but the true reward is the angel's kiss.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}{G}: Relentless Hunter gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I swore to take one head for each member of my family they killed. My task is nowhere near its end."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In this new world, I have seen the once-devout rhoxes take up arms with the savages of Jund. I would be offended, but I see the wisdom in their choice." - Gernan, Dawnray archer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Riptide Crab dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It sleeps with its claws open.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Savage Ventmaw attacks, add {R}{R}{R}{G}{G}{G}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample and lifelink. (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Urborg Drake attacks each combat if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Relentless as the sea, remorseless as death.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All skyships entering or leaving the fairgrounds must pass through the security checkpoint.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Put a charge counter on Culling Dais. {1}, Sacrifice Culling Dais: Draw a card for each charge counter on Culling Dais.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Forswear the flesh and you will truly see." - Jin-Gitaxias, Core Augur

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eager Construct enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loyal to a fault, it anticipates its master's every need.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield, if Genesis Chamber is untapped, that creature's controller creates a 1/1 colorless Myr artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As the experimental population grows, so does the number of myr. It's a perfect equilibrium." - Memnarch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blessed by the gods. Coveted by mortals. Beholden to neither.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Use everything. Iron, rust, scrap . . .even the ground must join our cause." - Ezuri, renegade leader

property.name: Rules
property.value: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many a besieged city has surrendered upon hearing the distinctive rumble of the juggernaut.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You've got to keep your wits about you on the roofs. Not all stones are compliant handholds." - Iveta, rooftop runner

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent draws a card, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ideas drift like petals on the wind. I have only to lift my face to the breeze."

property.name: Rules
property.value: All permanents are artifacts in addition to their other types. All cards that aren't on the battlefield, spells, and permanents are colorless. Players may spend mana as though it were mana of any color.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Night Market Guard can block an additional creature each combat.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "One head watches for Consulate enforcers. The other watches for renegade thieves." - Crime Lord Gonti

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Peace Strider enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Vanished must have sent it from beyond to aid us in this struggle." - Kessla, Sylvok shaman

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pierce Strider enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pain isn't a negative stimulus. Pain is a sign of your imperfection." - Sheoldred, Whispering One

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A light to bring hope in dark times.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color they choose.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sculptor, like most artists, put his heart and soul into his work. But the newly awakened golem decided it wanted its creator's other, more tangible parts.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though tempered differently, all wills can be broken." - Inquisitor Kyrik

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Poets dream the verses of otherworldly stories. Artificers dream the blueprints of other planar artifacts.
